name: Developer Roadmap Learning System
description: Ultra-comprehensive learning system for 69 developer roles with specialized agents, interactive roadmaps, and skill-based learning paths from roadmap.sh
author: Claude Code

agents.name: frontend-web-agent
agents.description: Specializes in web frontend technologies, frameworks, and UI development

agents.name: backend-server-agent
agents.description: Focuses on backend systems, server-side programming, and API development

agents.name: cloud-devops-agent
agents.description: Handles cloud platforms, containerization, and infrastructure automation

agents.name: data-ai-agent
agents.description: Specializes in data engineering, machine learning, and AI systems

agents.name: architecture-design-agent
agents.description: Focuses on system architecture, API design, and design patterns

agents.name: languages-fundamentals-agent
agents.description: Covers programming languages, CS fundamentals, and foundational concepts

agents.name: specialized-roles-agent
agents.description: Handles unique career paths like product management, devrel, and UX design

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Choose a role and begin your personalized learning journey

commands.name: browse-role
commands.description: Explore all 69 available developer roles and roadmaps

commands.name: assess
commands.description: Evaluate your current skills and get personalized recommendations

commands.name: roadmap
commands.description: Display detailed roadmap for any developer role

skills.name: frontend-web
skills.description: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Vue, Angular, and web ecosystem

skills.name: backend-server
skills.description: Node.js, Python, Java, Go, databases, and API design

skills.name: cloud-devops
skills.description: AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, terraform, and cloud infrastructure

skills.name: data-ai
skills.description: Data engineering, machine learning, AI, and analytics

skills.name: architecture-design
skills.description: System design, API design, design patterns, and architecture

skills.name: languages
skills.description: Python, JavaScript, Java, Go, Rust, PHP, and other languages

skills.name: specialized-roles
skills.description: Product management, DevRel, technical writing, and specialized skills
